description:
PyData New York City 2017

Slides: /redirect?v=Ed7-uH438x0&event=video_description&redir_token=4lFPYwBZMoM8RRzH7ua4HbtcA2d8MTUxOTY0NTAyNkAxNTE5NTU4NjI2&q=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.slideshare.net%2FPyData%2Fanalysts-nightmare-or-laundering-massive-spreadsheets-86424984

Poor data quality frequently invalidates data analysis when performed on Excel data that underwent transformations, imputations, and manual manipulations. In this talk we will use Pandas to walk through Excel data analysis and illustrate several common pitfalls that make this analysis invalid.
title: Feyzi Bagirov - Analyst’s Nightmare or Laundering Massive Spreadsheets
